subcategory.name: Badges
subcategory.description: Badge, chip, and pill examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS badge components to highlight important information, statuses, or counts in your application. These badges are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles.
